html: Judge - Defend and deliver them. Reprove - Or condemn their malicious enemies. Thy rod - With his word, which is his scepter, and the rod of his power, Psalm 110:2 ,, which is sharper than a sword, Hebrews 4:12 ,, by the preaching whereof he subdued the world to himself, and will destroy his enemies, 2 Thessalonians 2:8 . This he adds farther, to declare the nature of Christ's kingdom, that it is not of this world.
